name: CRESCENT MOON がぁる
summary: You play as a cat that walks into a tent and is transformed into a human by a breaking a crystal ball. You don't want to be a human, though! You liked being a cat! The owner of the broken crystal ball says that she'll reverse the curse if you can go through town and bring her the Crescent Moon Girl. That is how your quest begins.
info:
• 开发: ALICESOFT
  • 别名: Crescent Moon Gal, クレセントムーンがぁる
